mapper.select: SELECT id , username , task , priority , status , description , plan_date , done_date FROM task WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT TO_CHAR(plan_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') date , COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE username = #{username} AND plan_date BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} AND status IN ('1', '2') GROUP BY plan_date ORDER BY plan_date ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(done_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') date , COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE username = #{username} AND done_date BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} AND status = '3' GROUP BY done_date ORDER BY done_date ASC
